message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly exceptional and holds immense value to me. Given its worth, I believe it would also be a significant asset for you. Considering its true value and the benefits it can bring to you, I am extending an offer to purchase it for $9,500. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and my willingness to part with it. I understand its value to you might be around $8,000, but I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle that satisfies both our interests. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially working with you.
